price: 87. Mpe tosilaki kopesa yo mikapo sambo(1) тропа kozongela yango na kotanga mbala na mbala, na kurani ya monene.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَٰكَ سَبۡعٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمَثَانِي وَٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ ٱلۡعَظِيمَ
footnotes: 1  Mikapo sambo: Ezali suratu Al-Fâtihah (bofungoli), Esengeli na mizilima atanga yango na balosambo naye nionso.

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynāka sabʿan mina al-mathānī wal-qur'āna al-ʿaẓīma
